summary: In spring, a young girl leaves the island of Hokkaido to attend university in Tokyo.
cast: Takako Matsu|Seiichi Tanabe|Kazuhiko Kato|Kaori Fujii|Sansei Shiomi|Ken Mitsuishi|Tsunekazu Umeda|Jun'ichi Kubozono|Akio Jô|Rumi|Yuki Tateyama|Kae Egawa|Kanji Tsuda|Yumi Ota|Tsugumi|Yôsuke Eguchi|Noriko Fujima|Masatô Ibu|Somegorô Ichikawa|Tatsuya Ishii|Gô Jibiki|Tadayuki Kawase|Yumiko Kikuta|Kio Matsumoto|Kôshirô Matsumoto|Katsunari Mineno|Taro Ochiai|Kei Takyo|Haruki Yazawa|Kae Minami
title: Historia de abril (April Story)
